subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=艸17}}

# ''[[Eupatorium fortunei]]''
# [[orchid]]
# [[aromatic]], [[fragrant]]
# [[government]] [[office]] that [[handle]]s [[document]]s
# {{n-g|kanji used to [[transliterate]] borrowings from foreign languages, ''especially'' Buddhist terms from [[Sanskrit]]}}
# {{short for|lang=ja|[[阿蘭陀]], [[和蘭]], [[和蘭陀]]|tr=Oranda|nodot=1|sort=らん}}: [[Holland]], the [[Netherlands]]

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja|ラン科}} {{wp|Orchidaceae}}
{{ja-kanjitab|らん|yomi=o}} From {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=らん|-}} {{ltc-l|蘭}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|蘭|tr=lán}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=o|らん|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|らん|ラン}}

# an [[orchid]]
# a style of {{m|ja|家紋|tr=kamon||[[family]] [[crest]]}}, featuring designs of orchid [[flower]]s and/or [[leaf|leaves]] 
# {{lb|ja|sort=らん|archaic}} {{synonym of|lang=ja|藤袴|tr=fujibakama|sort=らん}}: ''[[Eupatorium fortunei]]'', a type of [[flower]] of the [[family]] [[Asteraceae]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
Proper noun
Derived terms
Etymology 2
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|らに}}

# {{lb|ja|archaic}} {{synonym of|lang=ja|藤袴|tr=fujibakama|sort=らん}}: ''[[Eupatorium fortunei]]'', a type of [[flower]] of the [[family]] [[Asteraceae]]

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|あららぎ|yomi=k}}

From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=|-}}, first attested in the ''{{w|Nihon Shoki}}'' (720 {{CE}}).

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=k|あららぎ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}
